Title: Min
Plot: Logan introduces Yukio to Cyclops as they make their way to Madripoor. After dropping off the duo, Cyclops heads home. Yukio and Wolverine are then ambushed by pirates and easily dispatch them. Logan goes on ahead leaving Yukio to handle the pirates alone. At night as Logan reaches another shoreline, vagrants jump him only to be shocked at his power.
